channel.title: IOS on Sujith Quintelier
channel.description: Recent content in IOS on Sujith Quintelier

item.title: dotnet: How to Build iOS Widgets with .NET MAUI
item.description:
A how-to article showing developers how to build iOS widgets using .NET MAUI, covering creation of widgets ranging from simple static displays to richer interactive experiences.

  • Source: .NET

item.title: dotnet: Implementing Cross-Platform In-App Billing in .NET MAUI Applications
item.description:
Microsoft’s .NET Blog introduces a new cross-platform billing sample that demonstrates how to implement in-app purchases in .NET MAUI apps for Android, iOS, Mac Catalyst, and Windows.

  • Source: .NET

item.title: github: Actions: macOS 26 image now in public preview
item.description:
GitHub Actions now offers a macOS 26 runner image in public preview so developers can natively use the latest Xcode technology to build and test iOS apps in their workflow runs.

  • Source: GitHub
